messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

messages.title: After thirteen years of Labour, it’s time for real change.
messages.content: Whether it's the worst recession in a generation or Labour’s failure to properly equip British troops fighting in Afghanistan, this Government has really lost its way.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Chancellor of the Exchequer, I would move immediately to get the banks lending to small businesses to help create jobs. We will break up the banks to ensure that people’s savings are never put at risk again.

issues.economy: As Chancellor of the Exchequer, I would move immediately to get the banks lending to small businesses to help create jobs. We will break up the banks to ensure that people’s savings are never put at risk again.
issues.governance: After thirteen years of Labour, it’s time for real change. Whether it's the worst recession in a generation or Labour’s failure to properly equip British troops fighting in Afghanistan, this Government has really lost its way.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’ve seen many recoveries come and go again and again on the economy.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer for the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests a preference for tactical voting, indicating a choice between the Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives, with Labour being out of the running in many areas.
